body_html:
Here is a finished implementation, using the cpp-extension tools to make it installable.

https://github.com/ClementPinard/Pytorch-Correlation-extension

Note that this is still subject to change, as DeviceTensor is not an official interface. In the near future, it will most probably be replaced with what comes from #8366

body:
Here is a finished implementation, using the cpp-extension tools to make it installable.

https://github.com/ClementPinard/Pytorch-Correlation-extension

Note that this is still subject to change, as DeviceTensor is not an official interface. In the near future, it will most probably be replaced with what comes from #8366
